definition: to log in (to a computer)/to enter (data)

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Unable to get a valid login hash.
sentences.chinese: 无法取得有效的登入杂凑。

sentences.english: Gets a value indicating whether the currently logged-on user is in the specified role.
sentences.chinese: 取得值，指出目前登入的使用者是否在指定的角色中。

sentences.english: Please enter your Username and Password to enter the Darlington Virtual Center.
sentences.chinese: 请输入你的登入名称及密码以进入控制中心。
资料库可经互联网登入。

sentences.english: Go to the website listed above and click on Lesson 6.
sentences.chinese: 登入《学乐网》网站，点击第6课《碰碰船》。

sentences.english: You can also visit World Vision Hong Kong's website to get the latest news of other activities.
sentences.chinese: 你亦可登入宣明会网页浏览相关活动的最新消息。

sentences.english: Cro sses are ladders to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 十字架是登入天堂的梯子。

sentences.english: How much link-time have you logged?
sentences.chinese: 你已经登入过多少时数了？

sentences.english: Tokenize logins, to make repeat attacks difficult?
sentences.chinese: 令登入重新登入，难以重复攻击？

sentences.english: Bob: I forgot that the weather forecast said there would be a typhoon today.
sentences.chinese: 我忘了，今天天气预报说有台风登入。

sentences.english: Tropical Storm Arthur is spinning off the coast of Belize.
sentences.chinese: 热带风暴“亚瑟”登入了伯利兹城海岸。

sentences.english: These days, however, he rarely checks in.
sentences.chinese: 然而多日来，他已很少登入了。

sentences.english: For Tradelink company users, please use your User ID and Password to login.
sentences.chinese: 贸易通用户请以用户编号和密码登入。

sentences.english: There are several different ways you can gain access to your cPanel.
sentences.chinese: 有需多方式可以让您登入控制台。

sentences.english: Gets the information from the data source for the current logged-on membership user.
sentences.chinese: 从资料来源取得目前登入成员资格使用者的资讯。

definition: to unbind (e.g. a phone number from an account)
to log out (computer)/to publish/to be published/to appear (in a newspaper etc)
to ban (narcotics, a movie etc)/to block (a road etc)/(Internet) to block (a user)
network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
